text: Hello :wave:  is there a way to use husbpot projects in dev mode while developing on a remote machine? We are not being able to get it working :thinkonk:

Hey <@U05RNDM3VM2> Are you able to provide what you've attempted and the errors you're getting?

It should be possible to use the CLI via a remote machine as long as you can access a terminal on that machine.

We don’t see any errors the only thing is that it doesn’t work the connection is done correctly and everything looks to work fine but when you access HubSpot you are not seeing what is being developed locally (what is shown on the image).



We have tried from several users with the same code on both sides :thinkonk:
